lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Earlier studies indicated private investment could sustain a two pct long-term economic growth rate, but the latest figures suggested this could not be maintained, it said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Firms have tended to finance expansion with debt rather than equity, leading to a 39 pct rise in the ratio of interest payments to gross cash flow between 1980/85, the survey found.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The outlook for Australian industrial investment is uncertain, with capital spending at an historical low and business overly dependent on domestic demand, the Australian Chamber of Manufactures and the National Institute of Economic and Industry Research said.
